
a)
-120 --> 10001000
-123 --> 10000101
	 00001101 overflow

+125 --> 01111101
-118 --> 10001010
         00000111  

118 0
59  1
29  1
14  0
7   1
3   1
1   1
0

118 --> 01110110 -118 -> 10001010

-28 -> 11100100
+96 -> 01100000
       01000100

28 = 16 + 8 + 4 = 00011100
-28 -> 11100100

96 = 64 + 32

+122 -> 01111010
+102 -> 01100110
        11100000 overflow

122 = 64 + 16 + 32 + 8 + 2
102 = 64 + 32 + 4 + 2


b) -8.5 
S = 1 

8 = 1000
0.5 = .1

M = 1000.1 -> 10001

E = 3 + 127 = 128 + 2 --> 10000010


1 10000010 00010000000000000000000
